dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4389 IH: To amend section 428 of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act to set aside funds for case management services for residents of permanent supportive housing for homeless persons, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Duffy introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend section 428 of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act to set aside funds for case management services for residents of permanent supportive housing for homeless persons, and for other purposes.

section.header: Funding for case management services for residents of supportive housing for homeless persons
section.text: Section 428 of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 11386b) is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: From the amounts made available to carry out this subtitle for each fiscal year, an amount equal to not less than 15 percent shall be used for grants to recipients of permanent supportive housing grants for use only to provide supportive services, including case management services, to residents of permanent supportive housing.
